Kyrgyzstan has a considerable rural poor population and an ongoing energy crisis.Many of these rural communities have livestock- making them perfect candidates for biogas digesters as a source of cheap- renewable power- with the added benefit of manure as a by-product. What community does this idea benefit and who are the main players?

By using the positive influencing of children and broadening this out to the whole grouping- the pilot community will recognise livestock excrement as a source of power and a solution to their energy needs.
